pkgmetadata.longdescription: TelegramQML or TgQML s a QML plugins, provides many components and tools for developers to create their own applications for Telegram using these tools and components. Also there are some examples and demos to help developers learn how TgQML works. Developers can build/use it as a library, qml-plugin or embedded in their source code. It's a highly flexible tool. It's free and open-source and released under the GPLv3 license. Also It's multiplatform and tested to be working on Linux, Windows, OSX, BSD, Android and UbuntuTouch without problems. It was created in a cooperation between Aseman Team and Ubuntu Core App Developers.
